tool.name: Calculate self correlation
tool.help:
========================== Calculate Auto-correlation ==========================
**What it does** This tool computes the autocorrelation of a numerical variable:
- Computes a graph
**Input description** A tabular file with observation data. Must at least contain three columns whith one numerical variable
+------------+ | number | +============+ | 4 | +------------+ | ... | +------------+
**Output** A png file with one graph showing if we have autocorrelation for a variable, if so the bars of the histogram are between the dashed lines (95% confidence intervalle without white noise) as shwon on the following image.
.. image::Autocorr.png
